Description:
Responsibilities:Represent buyers and sellers in real estate transactions.
Develop a comprehensive understanding of clients' needs and preferences to offer suitable properties.
Conduct comparative market analysis to estimate property value.
Coordinate open houses, showings, and inspections.
Negotiate purchase agreements, ensuring that clients' interests are protected.
Maintain real estate records, documents, and contracts.
Develop and maintain a network of clients, real estate professionals, and potential leads.
Stay up-to-date with local real estate markets, trends, and legislation.Skills
Skills:
Proven working experience as a Real Estate Agent or Real Estate Salesperson.
Proven track record of sales.
Strong sales, negotiation, and communication skills.
Proficiency in MS Office and property management software.
Ability to work independently with minimal supervision.
Excellent interpersonal and customer service skills.
Must have a reliable means of transportation.

Preferred.Nationality: All Anglophone Countries; All Eastern European Countries; All Western European Countries; Australia
